record.dc:title: 147BN17 West Cuba Landing, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 13BN2. Adult male deep in deposit. Strata have not yet been determined. Found in test trench. Square 103R5. Direction east and above.
record.wpa:narrative: Fully flexed burial oriented head north. Burial on right side, limbs forward. This burial was found in our test trench. We have not yet determined what nature our deposit will take. This burial seems to be indigenous to a level extending from approximately 0.8' above the burial to directly below it.
